About me

First of all, Thank You for visiting my site. Here you can see everything about me and you can contact me in any way, if you get bored you can play Hangman, and can guess the word easily if you come with a programming background. I am a person with a social spirit and with a sense of good things, also I set high goals and especially makes me happy when I realize them. I define myself by the work I want to do, not by the work I've done.

I can offer a complete solution with the technologies I work with. I would do my best and I prefer teamwork where all of us have a common vision for the things we build. I design and code beautifully simple things, you can check my mini projects and also take a look at our QubitDust team project it is down below and is hosted also, thanks to the academy which made us great friends.

Simply I love technology, my main hobby is building my setup, buying expensive things, and making my work environment a beautiful place where I draw inspiration and where I spend most of the day. Aside from all that I enjoy snowboarding, fitness, listening old school rap songs, reading some books, and making delicious pizza and pasta from Italian recipes. Now you know a little about me and you can contact me about everything that I can do for you.

My Creative Process

Interaction

When people are happy at work, they tend to do a better job. Errors are reduced, productivity increases and customer service improves. Having great office interaction also improves teamwork, which makes an entire team more efficient during times of high stress. It doesn't matter what your company does, what product or service it provides, good interaction means that people are having positive experiences. What are some examples of positive interactions?

Planning

Planning is the fundamental management function, which involves deciding beforehand, what is to be done, when is it to be done, how it is to be done and who is going to do it. Planning is nothing but thinking before the action takes place. It helps us to take a peep into the future and decide in advance the way to deal with the situations, which we are going to encounter in future. It involves logical thinking and rational decision making.

Productivity

You can now focus on the completion of tasks rather than the organization. When you know that all your tasks have been planned with the help of a time tracking software, you do not have to remember everything and you don’t have to worry about all the little details of everyday activities. You can rely on your work plan. And as a result, your mind will be energized and with your focus centered on your current task, you’ll be sure to hit optimum productivity.

Work-Life Balance

More often than not, we tend to dedicate a huge aspect of our lives to work. With little or no time to rest, it can take a mental and physical toll on us and our relationships outside work. When you have everything under control in the professional front, your mood automatically eases up, your energy is revived and you have enough time for social life.

Good Bug Solving Habits

They’re dramatic. The investigation of a great bug can be full of twists and turns. A great bug is like a good joke or a riddle — you’re expecting one outcome, but the result veers off in another direction.

Good Communication

Listening is perhaps one of the most important aspects of effective communication. Prepare your thoughts ahead of time and carefully think about what it is that you want to say. Skills allow you to understand and be understood by others. These can include but are not limited to sharing ideas with others, actively listening in conversations, giving and receiving feedback, and public speaking.

- H.Petrovski
